text: Romanichthyini is a tribe of freshwater ray-finned fish which is one of two tribes in the subfamily Luciopercinae, which in turn is classified under the family Percidae. == Taxonomy == The two genera are: * Romanichthys Dumitrescu, Bănărescu & Stoica 1957 * Zingel Cloquet, 1817 Category:Perciformes Category:Freshwater fish Category:Animals of Europe
title: Romanichthyini
